userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: For tithable lists use microfilm copy, Goochland County (Va.) Reels 81-83.
Use photostatic copy, Goochland County (Va.) Barcodes 1140197-1140198 and 1114761.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Goochland County (Va.) Tithables, 1730-1809, and undated. Goochland County (Va.) Reels 81-83. Local government records collection, Goochland County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Goochland County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Goochland County (Va.) Tithables, 1730-1809, and undated. Consists of a original and photostat copies of the list of tithable heads of household and taxable property in the county for the years 1730-1809, and undated. PHOTOSTATIC VOLUMES OR MICROFILM REELS SHOULD BE SERVED BEFORE ORIGINALS.
